channel.title: Face mask on Vivien BOGNE
channel.description: Recent content in Face mask on Vivien BOGNE

item.title: Face mask detector
item.description: Problem statement: We are building here a face mask detector app. This is a project made for our knowledge. Indeed the objective is to: learn how to use open CV in order to load images, Use a DL algorithm in other to classifier images Use OpenCV to infer the classifier and display the results. We will do this project using the steps below: Data collection and preparation: Collect or download some images and Prepare those images for a ML or DL algorithm.
